text: This is a list of animated television series produced in Pakistan. == Series == This is a list of Pakistani animated films with their networks, production company and running period. {| class="wikitable" !Series !Network(s) !Production company !Original run !Refs. |- |Burka Avenger |Geo Tez (season 1) Nickelodeon (Pakistani) (season 2–4) |Unicorn Black |2013–2016 | |- |Commander Safeguard |Various Channels |IAL Saatchi & Saatchi |2005–present | |- |Geo Cartoon |Geo News |Geo News |2016–present | |- |Quaid Say Baatein |Various Channels |Unicorn Black |2013–present | |} == See also == * List of Pakistani animated films == References == Pakistani Animated television series
title: List of Pakistani animated television series
